data.value: Neo is here to help with successful onboarding to quickly ramp you up to productivity!. With Neo you can -

data.name: IntroductionGreetText
data.value: Hi all, {0} here, happy to join as a part of the design team. I don't really know what to say though. Please reach out to me if you have any question.:)
data.comment: Text to show as header in introduction card.

data.name: IntroductionText
data.value: Get as far as you want, and as fun as you want. Here at Visa, we strive for an inclusive workplace. Its important that our employees know each other. Help us knowing you better by giving a quick intro of yours.
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.value: Please write your comments on the intro and I will inform {0}

data.name: ResumeMatchesCardContent
data.value: All set. I've paused your matches. You can turn them back on whenever you like.
data.comment: Content text for resume all matches card.

data.name: PauseMatchesButtonText
data.comment: Button text to pause pairings

data.name: ProposeMeetupButtonText
data.comment: Button text to propose the meetup with the match of the user

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart1
data.value: Hi there again, I'm {0}. A bot that pairs you with a new coworker to meet each week. This week your match is {1}.
data.comment: First part of the match up card main content

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart2
data.value: If you've got the inclination, set something up. See, meeting people *is* easy!
data.comment: Second part of the match up card main content

data.name: MatchUpCardMatchedText
data.comment: The text saying who the user has been matched up with

data.name: MatchUpCardTitleContent
data.comment: The title text for the pairup notification adaptive card

data.name: MeetupContent
data.value: Hey there, looks like we've been matched by {0} this week. It'd be great to meet up for a coffee or a lunch or a call if you've got time.
data.comment: Content of the Meetup for the propose meeting

data.name: MeetupTitle
data.comment: The title for the Meetup - {0} is the name of the first person that user has been matched with and {1} is the name of the user

data.name: InitiateChatText
data.comment: Initiation chat text message.

data.name: ChatWithMatchButtonText
data.comment: Button text to initiate a chat with the person the user has been matched up with

data.name: ErrorInUpdatingUserChoice
data.value: Something went wrong and I can't update your choice right now. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Error message when bot is unable to update user detail in storage.

data.name: BotUnrecognizedCommand
data.comment: Text when unrecognized command received from the bot.
